name: A leather belt with a thick mythril buckle
data: It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'power blast'.
